alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 430 PM CST... At 400 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kimball to near Pisgah. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Henagar, Ider, Pisgah, Rosalie, Long Island, Fabius, Higdon and Sulpher Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
